name: Ending Global Poverty
socialShareText: Help the four nonprofits on this Givelist address the challenges of global poverty. Backed by $10,000 of matched funding, your donation is amplified and directed to those most in need.
about: Help the four nonprofits on this Givelist address the challenges of global poverty. Backed by $10,000 of matched funding, your donation is amplified and directed to those most in need.

sponsor.description: Amplify your gift! Generous donors will match you dollar-for-dollar up to $20 each time until we reach $10,000 total matched.

nonprofits.name: New Incentives
nonprofits.about: We use cash transfers to increase immunization rates in Nigeria.

nonprofits.name: Give Directly
nonprofits.about: Delivering unconditional cash directly to the world's poorest households via secure mobile transfers.

nonprofits.name: Strong Minds
nonprofits.about: Provides life-changing mental health services to low-income Africans using an innovative community-based approach.

nonprofits.name: The Life You Can Save
nonprofits.about: We inspire effective giving in the fight against extreme poverty.
